author: jmason
msg: bug 1690: now has different lock timeouts for different bayes operations

author: felicity
msg: bug 1632: Razor modifies %ENV so we tried to use a local() to make a
temp version, which works, but kills %ENV for the Razor code as well.
So now we'll let the helper_mode functions handle backing up/restoring

author: felicity
msg: bug 1514: spamd was trying to use "../lib" which is ok most of the time,
but during a "make test" on perl 5.005 it errored out with the "bytes.pm"
error.  so we now check for a "../blib/lib" first and use it if it exists.
